  • Constructor Details

    • Model

      public Model(GameMode mode, String ip, int port, String name)
      The Model function is the constructor for the Model class. It takes in a GameMode, an IP address, a port number and a name as parameters. If it is in Host mode, it creates an instance of GameManager and starts up the server on that port number with its own client handler. Then it connects to itself using that same ip address and port number to create its own socket connection with itself (fg). It then sends out its name through this socket connection so that when another player joins later on they will know who's turn it is first.
      Parameters:
      mode - GameMode Determine if the client is a host or not
      ip - String Connect to the server
      port - int Create a new hostserver object
      name - String Identify the client to the server public model(gamemode mode, string ip, int port) { this(mode, ip, port,""); } public void listentohost() { thread t = new thread(new runnable() {

  • Method Details

    • joinGame

      public boolean joinGame(String name)
      The joinGame function is used to join a game.
      Parameters:
      name - String Identify the player
      Returns:
      A boolean value

    • tryPlaceWord

      public void tryPlaceWord(String word, int row, int col, boolean vertical)
      The tryPlaceWord function takes in a word, row, column and vertical boolean. It then creates a query string using the GameCommandsFactory class to create the tryPlaceWord command. The function then runs this command on the server by calling runCommand with this query string as an argument.
      Parameters:
      word - String Specify the word to be placed
      row - int Specify the row in which to place the word
      col - int Determine the column where the word is to be placed
      vertical - boolean Determine if the word is placed vertically or horizontally

    • challenge

      public boolean challenge(String word, int row, int col, boolean vertical)
      The challenge function is used to challenge a word that has been played by the opponent. The function returns true if the challenged word is valid, and false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      word - Specify the word that is being challenged
      row - Specify the row of the first letter in a word
      col - Specify the column of the first letter in a word
      vertical - Determine if the word is placed vertically or horizontally
      Returns:
      A boolean

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      The getBoard function returns the current board state of the game.
      Returns:
      The board as a byte array

    • skipTurn

      public void skipTurn()
      The skipTurn function is used to skip a player's turn. It takes no arguments and returns nothing.

    • swapTiles

      public void swapTiles()
      The swapTiles function is used to swap the tiles in a player's hand with new tiles from the bag. The function takes no parameters and returns nothing. It simply sends a command to the server, which then updates all the clients' games accordingly.
